Top 5 Vendor Smartphone Terbaik di Indonesia, Semangat Xiaomi Bikin Samsung ‘Jeblok’!
07 Nov 2019, 07:00 by Mansur
Xiaomi Berhasil Kalahkan Samsung, Tapi OPPO yang Berkuasa
Oketekno – Beberapa tahun terakhir nama Samsung memang terasa spesial di telinga masyarakat Indonesia. Akan tetapi pada kenyataannya di tahun ini tingkat popularitasnya mulai memudar, terlebih ketika sederet vendor asal China seperti Xiaomi, OPPO, Vivo, hingga Huawei yang melakukan akselerasi luar biasa guna menjadi vendor Smartphone terbaik di Indonesia.
Menurut data riset terbaru dari Canalys, kini Samsung telah mengalami penurunan pemasaran lagi. Semangat juang Xiaomi akhirnya kini telah membuahkan hasil, yakni mendahului pangsa pasar dari vendor asal Korea Selatan tersebut, meski kini posisinya masih tetap sama, yakni sebagai brand kedua terbaik di Indonesia.

Simak Nih: 

Respon Xiaomi Indonesia Soal Redmi Note 8 Pro yang Masih Sulit Didapatkan


Sebagaimana yang bisa dilihat dalam data berikut, OPPO menduduki posisi puncak dengan jumlah pemasaran di Indonesia sebesar 23%. Dibandingkan dengan periode yang sama pada tahun 2018 silam, jumlah ini telah mengalami peningkatan sebesar 47%.


Copyright ©Canalys

Kemudian untuk Xiaomi sekarang ini telah menguasai pasar Smartphone Indonesia sebesar 22%. Meski berada di urutan kedua, akan tetapi jumlah pemasaran yang didapatkannya telah mengalami peningkatan sebesar 22% dibandingkan periode yang sama tahun sebelumnya.

Ketahui Yuk: 

Meski Hanya Rp 6 Juta, Ini Dia yang Jadikan Mi CC9 Pro Layak Disebut Raja Kamera Juga


Lalu Samsung dengan posisinya yang dari posisi puncak menuju ke posisi 3 ini sebenarnya masih mendapatkan peningkatan market share 16% dibandingkan periode sama tahun kemarin. Hanya saja penguasaan pasar alias market share yang didapatkan kini cuman 21% saja. Mengalami penurunan market share sebesar 2.6%.
Selanjutnya di posisi keempat ada Vivo yang mendapatkan pertumbuhan paling besar di tahun ini, vendor asal China itu telah mengalami pertumbuhan 74% dibandingkan periode sama tahun sebelumnya. Meski demikian, posisinya sebagai vendor Smartphone terbaik di Indonesia masih kalah dengan para pesaingnya, karena market share yang didapat di Q3 2019 hanya 17% saja.
Dan di posisi ke 5 sebagai vendor Smartphone terbaik di Indonesia merupakan pendatang baru, yakni Realme. Sekarang ini market share yang telah didapatkannya di Tanah Air sebesar 11%. Dan pastinya di Q4 2019 bakal mengalami pertumbuhan lagi, sebab ada Realme 5, Realme 5 Pro dan Realme XT yang baru dirilis.

text:
Top 5 of the Best Smartphone Vendors in Indonesia, Xiaomi's Spirit Makes Samsung ‘Drop!’
Nov 7 2019, 07:00 by Mansur
Xiaomi Successfully Defeated Samsung, But OPPO is in charge
Oketekno - The last few years the name Samsung indeed feels special in the ears of the people of Indonesia. But in fact this year the level of popularity began to fade, especially when a series of vendors from China such as Xiaomi, OPPO, Vivo, to Huawei which made extraordinary acceleration in order to become the best smartphone vendor in Indonesia.
According to the latest research data from Canalys, Samsung has now experienced a decline in marketing again. Xiaomi's fighting spirit has finally come to fruition, which is to overtake the market share of the South Korean vendor, although now its position is still the same, namely as the second best brand in Indonesia.

Listen Here:

Xiaomi Indonesia's Response Regarding Redmi Note 8 Pro, which is still difficult to obtain


As can be seen in the following data, OPPO tops the list with the number of marketing in Indonesia at 23%. Compared to the same period in 2018, this number has increased by 47%.


Copyright © Canalys

Then for Xiaomi now it has controlled the Indonesian Smartphone market by 22%. Although ranked second, but the amount of marketing it has gained has increased by 22% compared to the same period the previous year.

Let's Know:

Even though it's only Rp. 6 million, this is what makes the CC9 Pro Mi Worthy of being called the Camera King too


Then Samsung with its position from the top position to position 3 is actually still getting an increase in market share of 16% compared to the same period last year. It's just that the market share alias market share gained is only 21%. Has a market share decline of 2.6%.
Furthermore, in the fourth position there is Vivo which gets the biggest growth this year, the Chinese vendor has experienced 74% growth compared to the same period the previous year. However, its position as the best Smartphone vendor in Indonesia is still inferior to its competitors, because the market share gained in Q3 2019 is only 17%.
And in 5th place as the best Smartphone vendor in Indonesia is a newcomer, namely Realme. Now this market share he has gained in the country is 11%. And certainly in Q4 2019 will experience growth again, because there is a Realme 5, Realme 5 Pro and Real XT which has just been released.
